project.name: http://phase2generator.com/
project.description: phase2generator is a tool which helps to create and visualise business models. Exact questions, embedded video tips and resources helps to understand the idea of a potentual business. Also it's possible to submit the business ideas directly to a HackFwd referrer.
project.what_we_did: Together with our friends at 9elements we've realized the concept and developed the application, based on Ruby on Rails.
